title: Ticket #2369: Have Condor service on Windows depend on Dhcp service
description: The original plan was to add a dependency to the Dhcp service so that Condor does not get started before the dhcp service. While the delayed startup will help, the functionality does not exist on XP. As such, a dependency on dhcp will still be needed.
remarks:
2011-Aug-22 15:16:47 by tannenba:
Reviewed by TJ and Tim. All happy.
attachments: • sdep.patch 1117 bytes added by ziliang on 2011-Aug-09 20:28:07 UTC.
check_ins: 2011-Aug-09 15:51   Check-in [26699]: Make the Condor service depend on Dhcp on Windows. Ticket #2369. (By Ziliang Guo )
